body:
Hello, My name is vsplesk101. I consider myself a good pvper, and when i die, I accept it (Unless I suspect its hacking... then i just go ham!) Anyways, I've been enjoying the mini-game "Nebula", cause its the only mini game i play pretty much :P, the reason i play it - Its related to the mini game on another server, and no i'm not going to tell the IP... (I'm not much of an advertiser). I also play on a lot of Factions, Soup PVP, and Pot PVP. 

 *I do sometimes get mad at players who kill me... So you might expect some un-desired language... But I'll try to maintain it...(For once, Speed/Kill aura/Focus/No-Knockback/ etc. I really hate!) 

 So i hope I'll stay around and enjoy the server as much as a lot of people do... So yea... Dont have much to say, I'm not good with speeches :P.

 Please forgive me, Any player I have been mean to. I love all players (Not hackers). <3

replies.body: Hey Hey! ! :D Welcome to the Avicus Community! Feel free to ask any Staff Members any questions or concerns you may have, as we will help you! ! As for that, enjoy your stay here at this wonderful server ! ! :DD (You'll love it here ;)

replies.body: Heyo! Welcome to the Avicus Network. I hope you enjoy your time here :)
replies.body_tagged: Heyo! Welcome to the Avicus Network. I hope you enjoy your time here :)

replies.body:
Welcome!

As Princezz_Dubstep said, if you have any questions, feel free to ask either myself or any other staff member here and we'd be happy to help. Enjoy your stay!

Regards, -Jake
